crons.description: Hourly check for overdue invoices and send Day 5/15/30 reminder emails
Every 6 hours - Auto-escalate overdue invoices through collections stages (gentle → firm → final → agency)
Hourly check for payment verification deadlines - Send reminders at 24h/6h marks, auto-resume collections if deadline expires
Daily at midnight UTC - Generate invoices from active recurring invoice schedules
Every minute - Retry failed webhooks with exponential backoff (max 5 retries before dead letter queue)
